description: Expert in Django, Flask, and React. Offers weekly sessions and hands-on coding help.
Guides students in model building, ML algorithms, and Kaggle competitions.
Mentors beginners in design tools like Figma, Adobe XD and portfolio building.
Covers ethical hacking, penetration testing, and career advice in infosec.
Assists with AWS, Azure, Docker, and CI/CD pipelines.
Helps students crack coding rounds and contests on Codeforces and Leetcode.
Teaches SEO, Google Ads, social media marketing, and freelancing tips.
Guides on building Android apps using Kotlin and Flutter.
Mentors aspiring entrepreneurs on business planning and startup funding.
Assists with research papers, PhD applications, and deep learning concepts.
